Posted By: Usaden (2/23/2011 6:12:28 AM)

posts.post_content:
Yay! Strictly-better-than-[Shatter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shatter) sees play in constructed!! Probably should've expected that with an artifact set in the mix, but it still took me by entirely pleasant surprise.
  
In limited, artifact removal has gone down slightly in worth with the release of Beseiged, but this card is still first-pickable, and a clear signal that your neighbors aren't white if you get it later than 3rd-pick.
posts.html:
